description: This file is a Python script that sets up a data processing pipeline involving downloading a text file, reading data, creating a vector index, and using an agent to answer questions based on the data.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base to answer questions.

classes.name: LlamaIndexKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base built from a vector index retriever.

classes.name: SimpleDirectoryReader
classes.description: Reads data from a directory of documents.

classes.name: StorageContext
classes.description: Manages storage context for the index.

classes.name: VectorStoreIndex
classes.description: Creates a vector index from nodes.

classes.name: SentenceSplitter
classes.description: Splits documents into nodes based on sentences.

classes.name: VectorIndexRetriever
classes.description: Retrieves nodes from the vector index.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Uses the agent to generate and print a response to a question.
